item.description: So there is a national pop punk Female fronted band coming through. Bonfire Bandit will be playing and making you dance, since you are wonderful dancers. They serve food there. So, lets have dinner around 7pm? They start charging a cover at 8pm. Live music starts at 9pm 9pm Superprime http://super-prime.org/ 10pm Bonfire Bandit http://www.youtube.com/bonfirebandit 11pm Dollyrots http://www.dollyrots.com/ Feel free to text me when you get there. 646 283 5555
item.why: Its a fun venue, pool tables, live music, food and such...
item.name: Dinner / drinks / live music / dancing @ Church
